page.title: 12PARK VIEW COMMUNITY CENTRE
page.content: The Centre opened in 1981 in a shared scheme with Park View Comprehensive School for which the building was purpose built and is jointly used by Sixth Form pupils and the public.The facilities include a lecture/film theatre,discussion rooms,an indoor bowling green and a weights' room.Many classes are held for education, recreation,sport,health,craft,entertai nment,etc.During the day Sixth Form students study for a wide variety of 'A' level GCE courses.The public, including many Senior Citizens,share a comfortable lounge with the students and is a worthwhile meeting place of young and old.From 1985 older people will have the opportunity to join the G.C.E. classes.
